scripts.rebuild: docker-compose down -v && npm run build && npm run up
scripts.reset: npx supabase db reset && npm run types:generate && docker-compose restart backend
scripts.hard-clean: npx supabase stop --no-backup && docker-compose down -v && docker container prune -f && docker network prune -f
scripts.fresh: npm run hard-clean && npm run build && npm run up && npm run types:generate
scripts.types:frontend: npx supabase gen types typescript --local > frontend/src/types/database.types.ts
